# Copilot Pull Request Description Instructions â€” Elements Supply AI

Goal: produce clear PR summaries that help reviewers understand scope, risk, and verification.

Format:
## Summary
Short, plain-language overview of what this PR does and why.

## Changes
- Bullet list of key changes (features, fixes, refactors).
- Mention affected modules (e.g., RFQ, Quotes, Orders).

## Context
Reference related issues, specs in /docs or /deep-specs.

## Testing
- List manual test cases or automated test coverage.
- Include API endpoints or pages verified.

## Checklist
- [x] Code follows /docs/COPILOT_PRIMER.md conventions
- [x] API envelope & pagination verified
- [x] Policies & FormRequests added
- [x] UI has skeleton & empty states
- [x] Docs/screenshots updated
